concept.title: Use two CVF(wrong use)
concept.shortdesc: Incorrect usage of myfruit and platform attributes

conbody.p: Incorrect usage of otherprops attribute otherprops value is :fruits otherprops value is :apples otherprops value is :banan otherprops value is :pine otherprops value is: NULL otherprops value is : a space character

p.lq: otherprops attribute within lq tag( lq could not contain otherprops attribute)
p.b: otherprops attribute within b tag( b could not contain otherprops attribute)

conbody.pre: platform value is NULL within pre tag
conbody.p: platform value is a blank character within p tag
conbody.note: platform value is mswi within note tag
conbody.codeblock: platform value is ZOs within codeblock tag
conbody.p: correct use of platform platform value is linux within data tag platform platform value is os within lq tag platform value is mswin within xref tag
